ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: Just recently bought a pair of singing steel boots myself and I paid a nice round 2k for them.  I still feel it s a lot of money for a pair of shoes, but it
ygData.messageBody:
Just recently bought a pair of singing steel boots myself and I paid a
nice round 2k for them. I still feel it's a lot of money for a pair
of shoes, but it finally breaks up that damn blue I've been getting
bored with ;-)

My question is how do I get the things to give me some water,
right-click doesn't seem to work?? Not sure I want to drink something
that's been so close to my feet when I'm wandering through swamps, but
it's the thought that counts!

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
<Ginnunga>
...bitten by the shopping bug again!

Mith Marr server

On Thu, 8 Jun 2000 18:33:39 -0500, "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
wrote:

>One more thing: How much is Singing Steel going for on the other servers?
>Saw a level one bard mule last night auctioning SS Boots. He told me he
>can get 15k plat for them. For that much, I'ld rather just try to organize a
>guild event in Karnor's and loot them myself :oP
>
>-=B=-
>34th
>The Rathe
